GeochemXYDiagram.name: AF Control Diagram (Ti)
GeochemXYDiagram.Comment: Alkali Feldspar, projected from Ca Feldspar. Molar ratios used throughout the PER-GER ratio diagrams
"AF" alkali feldspar control line, "Mu" muscovite control line, "Als" aluminosilicate control line (Ox axis)
Anorthite has no effect on sample position (it is projected from)
GeochemXYDiagram.Reference: Stanley C. R., and Madeisky H. E., 1996 Lithogeochemical Exploration for Metasomatic Zones Associated with Hydrothermal Mineral Deposits Using Pearce Element Ratio Analysis
